title: boby
storyDescription: lovely dog playing with his friends
generatedStory:
Page 1:
Page 1: Today was Boby the dog's first day of school. He put on his glasses, brushed his black fur, and licked his black nose. Boby looked at his reflection and gave a happy wag with his tail. He was excited to meet his new friends. Page

Page 2:
2: At school, Boby saw lots of interesting dogs. There was a dog with spots, one with fluffy fur, and even one with a curly tail. He played fetch with his friends, tails wagging and tongues out. Boby's first day of school was fun-filled and exciting!
